data.title: Trailer Hitch Install: CURT 12112 on a Mazda CX-9
data.tags: CURT Receiver Hitch, trailer hitch, towing, how to install, Mazda CX-9, CURT 12112
data.description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 12112 class 2 trailer hitch on a 2008 Mazda CX-9. 

Install Sheet - 
https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/12112/installsheet/CM_12112_INS.PDF

Application Coverage:
2007-2015 Mazda CX-9

Special Notes:
***DO NOT EXCEED VEHICLE MANUFACTURER'S RECOMMENDED TOWING CAPACITY***
PERIODICALLY CHECK THIS RECEIVER HITCH TO ENSURE THAT ALL FASTENERS
ARE TIGHT AND THAT ALL STRUCTURAL COMPONENTS ARE SOUND.

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.

data.title: Trailer Wiring Install: CURT 55567 on Toyota Camry
data.tags: CURT Receiver Hitch, trailer hitch, towing, how to install, CURT 55567, Toyota Camry, Toyota FJ Cruiser, Mazda 6
data.description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 55567 custom vehicle-to-trailer wiring harness on the 2013 Toyota Camry. You must read and understand the supplied instruction sheet(s) prior to installing.

https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/55567/installsheet/CME_55567_INS.PDF


Application Coverage:
2007 - 2015 Toyota Camry(except 2012 Hybrid and 2007 - 2009 SE Models)
2007 - 2014 Toyota FJ Cruiser
2008 - 2003 Mazda 6(except 2006 - 2007 Mazdaspeed Models)



Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.

data.title: Trailer Wiring Install: CURT 56126 on 2013 Hyundai Elantra
data.tags: CURT Trailer wiring, towing, how to install, Hyundai Elantra, curt 56126
data.description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 56126 T-Connector and custom wiring harness on a 2013 Hyundai Elantra.

Install Sheet:
https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/56126/installsheet/CME_56126_INS.PDF

Application Coverage:
2011 - 2012 Hyundai Elantra Coupe
2011 - 2015 Hyundai Elantra Sedan

Special Notes:
All Steps must be followed to ensure correct function of the T-Connector.  To verify proper installation once installed, test by connecting a test light or properly wired trailer.

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.

data.title: Gooseneck Hitch Install: CURT 60635 with 60607 on Dodge Ram 2500
data.tags: CURT Gooseneck Hitch, trailer hitch, how to install, Dodge Ram, 2500, 3500, CURT 60635, CURT 60607
data.description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 60635 underbed install kit with the CURT 60607 doublelock gooseneck hitch on a 2001 Dodge Ram 2500 quad cab with a short bed.

Install Sheet:
https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/60635/installsheet/CM_60635_INS.PDF
https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/60607/installsheet/CM_60607_INS.PDF

Application Coverage:
1994-2002 Dodge Ram 2500 & 3500 

Special Notes:
***DO NOT EXCEED VEHICLE MANUFACTURER'S RECOMMENDED TOWING CAPACITY***
Do not install mounting rails over plastic bed liners. Plastic bed liners must be cut out of the way to provide metal to metal contact. Base rails may be installed on spray in liners.

Only use provided hardware.
Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.

PERIODICALLY CHECK THIS RECEIVER HITCH TO ENSURE THAT ALL FASTENERS
ARE TIGHT AND THAT ALL STRUCTURAL COMPONENTS ARE SOUND.

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.
-Need help or have some questions? Call Technical Support at 800.798.0813 (Monday-Friday 8am-7pm CST)
asset.author: CURT Manufacturing

data.title: Front Mount Hitch Install: CURT 31604 on Dodge Ram
data.tags: CURT Receiver Hitch, trailer hitch, front mount hitch, how to install, Dodge Ram, curt 31604
data.description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 31604 front mount hitch on a 1995 Dodge Ram.

Install Sheet: 
https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/31604/installsheet/CM_31604_INS.PDF


Application Coverage:
1994 - 2002 Dodge Ram Full Size Truck

Drilling may be required.


Special Notes:
***DO NOT EXCEED VEHICLE MANUFACTURER'S RECOMMENDED TOWING CAPACITY***
PERIODICALLY CHECK THIS RECEIVER HITCH TO ENSURE THAT ALL FASTENERS
ARE TIGHT AND THAT ALL STRUCTURAL COMPONENTS ARE SOUND.
*** USE EXISTING VEHICLE HARDWARE ***

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.
